name: Magby
flavorText:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

previous.name: Elekid
previous.flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

next.name: Miltank
next.flavorText:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

pokemon.name: Magby
pokemon.flavorText:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.flavorText:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

pokemon.name: Magmortar
pokemon.flavorText:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
